bug.summary: mkl-dnn engine crash on cpu without avx2 support
bug.description: It's known that the mkl-dnn engine not support machines without avx2. But the engine will crash with "illegal instructionâ€œ. Users will not happy to see the program crash. Rather than crash, should the engine still work on machine without avx2 support ? Maybe use other instruction set instead of avx2 when no avx2 support ?

comments.comment: You are right, mkl-dnn should not crash on cpus w/o avx2. There is already a patch in the queue that fixes this. It will be pushed to github soon.
